description: Removed FunctionClearKeysSoFar from state change types and TS typings.
Both getA11yStatusMessage and getA11ySelectionMessage will be called with the same props as the getA11yStatusMessage in <Downshift>, apart from previousResultCount
Only when server-side rendering (SSR): If you get a checksum error because of the automatically generated id's from downshift, simply call resetIdCounter before ReactDOM.renderToString.
